ny: Chinachake chomwe muyenera kudziwa za ine ndi chakuti mantha anga aakulu m'moyo ndi chakuti anthu adzapeza kuti ndine wosauka.

en: Tom pressed his ear against the wall to see if he could hear what his parents were discussing in the next room.
ny: Tom anakanikizira khutu ku khoma kuti aone ngati angamve zimene makolo ake ankakambirana m’chipinda china.

en: Tom was obsessed by the belief that, one by one, everyone around him was being abducted and replaced by aliens.
ny: Tom anatengeka mtima ndi chikhulupiriro chakuti, mmodzimmodzi, aliyense womuzungulira anali kulandidwa ndi kuloŵedwa m’malo ndi alendo.

en: I know that it is highly unlikely that you'd ever want to go out with me, but I still need to ask at least once.
ny: Ndikudziwa kuti n'zokayikitsa kuti mungafune kutuluka nane, koma ndikufunikabe kufunsa kamodzi.

en: Acting on advice from his astronomers, Alexander the Great decided not to attack Egypt and went to India instead.
ny: Potsatira malangizo a akatswiri a zakuthambo, Alesandro Wamkulu anasankha kusaukira Igupto ndi kupita ku India.

en: I came here to see if there was something I could do to help, but there doesn't seem to be anything for me to do.
ny: Ndinabwera kuno kudzawona ngati pali chinachake chimene ndingachite kuti ndithandize, koma zikuwoneka kuti palibe chimene ndingachite.

en: I know you're upset about your car being totaled, but you weren't injured and you should be thankful to be alive.
ny: Ndikudziwa kuti mwakhumudwa chifukwa choti galimoto yanu yadzaza, koma simunavulale ndipo muyenera kuthokoza kuti muli ndi moyo.

en: The World Health Organization says alcohol abuse is the third leading cause of death and disability in the world.
ny: Bungwe la World Health Organization lati kumwa mowa mwauchidakwa ndi nambala yachitatu yomwe imayambitsa imfa ndi kulemala padziko lonse lapansi.

en: Babies can become dehydrated from a high fever, so I was told that it would be better to send him to the hospital.
ny: Ana amatha kutaya madzi m'thupi chifukwa cha kutentha thupi kwambiri, choncho ndinauzidwa kuti zingakhale bwino kuwatumiza kuchipatala.

en: Did you know that in Japan, if you have a tattoo, you won't be allowed to bathe in many of the hot spring resorts?
ny: Kodi mumadziwa kuti ku Japan, ngati muli ndi tattoo, simuloledwa kusamba m'malo ambiri otentha otentha?

en: Everybody has a right to his own opinion. However, sometimes it's better not to tell anybody what that opinion is.
ny: Aliyense ali ndi ufulu pamalingaliro ake. Komabe, nthawi zina ndi bwino kusauza aliyense maganizo awo.

en: The Himalayas were formed by the collision of the tectonic plates of India and Eurasia about 50 million years ago.
ny: Mapiri a Himalaya anapangidwa ndi kugunda kwa mbale za tectonic za India ndi Eurasia pafupifupi zaka 50 miliyoni zapitazo.

en: The police can't find a single person who remembers seeing you where you said you were on the night of the murder.
ny: Apolisi sapeza munthu m'modzi yemwe amakumbukira kukuwonani komwe mudati munali usiku wakupha.

en: Tom likes Mary, but Mary likes John. To make matters even more interesting, John likes Alice, but Alice likes Tom.
ny: Tom amakonda Mariya, koma Mary amakonda Yohane. Kuti zinthu zikhale zosangalatsa kwambiri, John amakonda Alice, koma Alice amakonda Tom.

en: Tom was sad when he discovered that Mary was a gold digger and Mary was sad when she discovered that Tom was poor.
ny: Tom anakhumudwa atazindikira kuti Mary anali wokumba golide ndipo Mary anakhumudwa atazindikira kuti Tom anali wosauka.

en: What kind of a parent would leave their child unattended in the car outside the pub while they're inside drinking?
ny: Kodi ndi kholo lotani limene lingasiyire mwana wawo m’galimoto popanda womuyang’anira kunja kwa malo ogulitsira pamene ali mkati akumwa?

en: Witnesses told police that the train was travelling way over the speed limit when it derailed going around a bend.
ny: Mboni zinauza apolisi kuti sitimayo inali kuyenda modutsa malire othamanga kwambiri pamene inadutsa m’njira ina.

en: The Belo Monte dam in Brazil is a controversial project because of its impact on the environment and native people.
ny: Damu la Belo Monte ku Brazil ndi ntchito yomwe anthu amakangana chifukwa cha momwe imakhudzira chilengedwe komanso anthu ammudzi.

en: Tom's constant arguing irritates some of his classmates. However, most of the class has just learned to ignore him.
ny: Kukangana kosalekeza kwa Tom kumakwiyitsa anzake a m’kalasi. Komabe, ambiri a m’kalasi angophunzira kumene kunyalanyaza iye.

en: How's the trouble and strife? is an example of a sentence using Cockney rhyming slang. It means "How's your wife?"
ny: Vuto ndi ndewu zili bwanji? ndi chitsanzo cha chiganizo chogwiritsa ntchito mawu akuti Cockney rhyming slang. Amatanthauza "Mkazi wako ali bwanji?"

en: Getting your message across is much more important than trying to say it exactly like a native speaker would say it.
ny: Kutumiza uthenga wanu ndikofunikira kwambiri kuposa kuyesa kunena ndendende monga momwe wolankhula mbadwa anganene.

en: Over 100 tons of dust and sand-sized particles bombard the earth every day from space, most of which goes unnoticed.
ny: Kupitilira matani 100 a fumbi ndi tinthu tating'onoting'ono ta mchenga timaphulitsa dziko lapansi tsiku lililonse kuchokera mumlengalenga, zomwe zambiri sizimazindikirika.

en: The typical elements of a foreign culture are changed into the typical elements of the local culture of translators.
ny: Zochitika za chikhalidwe chachilendo zimasinthidwa kukhala zochitika za chikhalidwe cha komweko cha omasulira.

en: Tom tried to sell his old VCR instead of throwing it away, but no one would buy it, so he ended up throwing it away.
ny: Tom anayesa kugulitsa VCR yake yakale m’malo moitaya, koma palibe amene akanaigula, motero anaitaya.

en: A man touched down on the moon. A wall came down in Berlin. A world was connected by our own science and imagination.
ny: Munthu anakhudza mwezi. Khoma linagwa ku Berlin. Dziko lapansi linalumikizidwa ndi sayansi yathu komanso malingaliro athu.

en: Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect, but rather that you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
ny: Kukhala wosangalala sikutanthauza kuti zonse ndi zangwiro, koma kuti mwasankha kuyang'ana kupyola zolakwa.

en: Dr. Zamenhof believed that a language belongs to the people who speak it which is why he never copyrighted Esperanto.
ny: Dr. Zamenhof ankakhulupirira kuti chinenero ndi cha anthu amene amachilankhula n’chifukwa chake sanalole Chiesperanto kukopera.

en: Every student who has graduated from our university has studied English with a native speaker for at least two years.
ny: Wophunzira aliyense amene wamaliza maphunziro ku yunivesite yathu waphunzira Chingelezi ndi wolankhula mbadwa kwa zaka zosachepera ziwiri.

en: If you don't want to put on sunscreen, that's your problem. Just don't come complaining to me when you get a sunburn.
ny: Ngati simukufuna kuvala zoteteza ku dzuwa, ndiye vuto lanu. Osangobwera kudzandidandaula ukapsa ndi dzuwa.

en: It took Tom several hours to assemble a bunk bed that the instructions said would take less than an hour to assemble.
ny: Tom zinamutengera maola angapo kuti akonze bedi losanjikizana lomwe malangizowo ananena kuti zingatenge nthawi yosakwana ola limodzi kuti akonze.

en: Nobody has asked you to agree, but can't you at least accept that there are people who hold different views from you?
ny: Palibe amene wakufunsani kuti muvomereze, koma kodi simungavomereze kuti pali anthu omwe amasiyana maganizo ndi inu?

en: Tom didn't know the meaning of "anglophobia," so he did a quick web search to see if he could find out what it meant.
ny: Tom sankadziwa tanthauzo la mawu akuti “anglophobia,” choncho anafufuza mwamsanga pa intaneti kuti aone ngati angadziwe tanthauzo lake.

en: Even though computer programmers may use semicolons every day, nowadays most people only use semicolons for emoticons.
ny: Ngakhale opanga mapulogalamu apakompyuta amatha kugwiritsa ntchito ma semicolons tsiku lililonse, masiku ano anthu ambiri amangogwiritsa ntchito ma semicolons potengera ma emoticons.

en: I had never eaten any kind of Thai food, so I was pretty excited about going to a Thai restaurant with my grandmother.
ny: Ndinali ndisanadyeko mtundu uliwonse wa chakudya cha ku Thailand, kotero ndinali wokondwa kupita kumalo odyera achi Thai ndi agogo anga aakazi.

en: The room didn't look very good after Tom painted it, because he didn't even bother to wash the walls or ceiling first.
ny: Chipindacho sichinawonekere bwino Tom atachipaka utoto, chifukwa sanavutike nkomwe kutsuka makoma kapena denga.

en: When does your sister come back from work? "I don't know, but I think she'll arrive at home a few minutes before me."
ny: Kodi sister wako akuchokera ku ntchito? "Sindikudziwa, koma ndikuganiza kuti afika panyumba patatsala mphindi zochepa kuti ndikhale."

en: Four of my favorite Christmas carols are "Silent Night," "Joy to the World," "The First Noel" and "Away in the Manger."
ny: Nyimbo zinayi za Khrisimasi zomwe ndimakonda ndi "Silent Night," "Joy to the World," "Noel Woyamba" ndi "Away in the Manger."

en: My friend recommended that I shouldn't buy an iPad yet, but to wait until I see what Apple's competitors come out with.
ny: Mnzanga adandilimbikitsa kuti ndisagule iPad pano, koma ndidikire mpaka nditawona zomwe opikisana ndi Apple atuluka nazo.

en: Roger Miller entered the United States Army at the age of seventeen. He was sent to an army base near Atlanta, Georgia.
ny: Roger Miller adalowa m'gulu lankhondo la United States ali ndi zaka khumi ndi zisanu ndi ziwiri. Anatumizidwa kumalo a asilikali pafupi ndi Atlanta, Georgia.

en: A trade delegation has gone to Japan ahead of the Prime Minister to crunch the numbers with their Japanese counterparts.
ny: Nthumwi zamalonda zapita ku Japan patsogolo pa Prime Minister kuti awononge ziwerengero ndi anzawo aku Japan.

en: Anyone whose comfort level depends on what someone else is wearing really needs to take a long, hard look at themselves.
ny: Aliyense amene chitonthozo chake chimadalira pa zomwe wina wavala ayenera kudziyang'anira motalika.

en: I think it's highly unlikely that Tom was not aware that he wouldn't be allowed to enter the museum without his parents.
ny: Ndikuganiza kuti ndizokayikitsa kuti Tom samadziwa kuti sakaloledwa kulowa mnyumba yosungiramo zinthu zakale popanda makolo ake.

en: I was lucky that the policeman didn't give me a ticket for making a U-turn at an intersection that had a no U-turn sign.
ny: Ndinachita mwayi kuti wapolisiyo sanandipatse tikiti yokhotera U-turn pamphambano yomwe inalibe chizindikiro cha U-turn.

en: Tom isn't your average guy. He doesn't like things most guys like and he doesn't like to do things most men enjoy doing.
ny: Tom si munthu wanu wamba. Sakonda zinthu zomwe anyamata ambiri amakonda komanso sakonda kuchita zinthu zomwe amuna ambiri amakonda kuchita.

en: Cesar Chavez asked that strikers remain non-violent even though farm owners and their supporters sometimes used violence.
ny: Cesar Chavez adapempha kuti onyanyala azikhala opanda chiwawa ngakhale eni minda ndi owatsatira nthawi zina amagwiritsa ntchito ziwawa.

en: Even now, I occasionally think I'd like to see you. Not the you that you are today, but the you I remember from the past.
ny: Ngakhale panopo, nthawi zina ndimaganiza kuti ndikufuna kukuwonani. Osati inu amene muli lero, koma inu amene ndimakumbukira kale.

en: We should spend our time creating content for our website rather than wasting time worrying about minor cosmetic details.
ny: Tiyenera kugwiritsa ntchito nthawi yathu kupanga zinthu zapawebusayiti yathu m'malo motaya nthawi kudera nkhawa zazinthu zazing'ono zodzikongoletsera.

en: A lot of people who have up until now been spending money having a good time now need to be more careful with their money.
ny: Anthu ambiri omwe mpaka pano akhala akuwononga ndalama kukhala ndi nthawi yabwino tsopano ayenera kusamala kwambiri ndi ndalama zawo.

en: It's very easy to sound natural in your own native language, and very easy to sound unnatural in your non-native language.
ny: Ndikosavuta kumveketsa mwachilengedwe m'chilankhulo chanu, komanso kumveka kosagwirizana ndi chilankhulo chanu chomwe sichanu.

en: The difference between the right word and almost the right word is the difference between lightning and the lightning bug.
ny: Kusiyana kwa liwu loyenera ndi pafupifupi liwu lolondola ndiko kusiyana kwa mphezi ndi mphezi.

en: Your English is grammatically correct, but sometimes what you say just doesn't sound like what a native speaker would say.
ny: Chingelezi chanu ndi cholondola mwa galamala, koma nthawi zina zomwe mukunena sizimveka ngati zomwe wolankhula mbadwa anganene.

en: I have Japanese and Chinese friends who speak to each other in English since that is the only language they have in common.
ny: Ndili ndi anzanga achijapani ndi achi China omwe amalankhulana m'Chingerezi chifukwa ndi chilankhulo chokha chomwe amafanana.

en: All the doctors say that I shouldn't drink coffee, but, despite that, I do have a bit now and then when I'm in good company.
ny: Madokotala onse amanena kuti sindiyenera kumwa khofi, koma, ngakhale zili choncho, ndimakhala ndi kanthaŵi ndikakhala ndi anthu abwino.

en: Make a good translation of the sentence that you are translating. Don't let translations into other languages influence you.
ny: Tanthauzirani bwino chiganizo chimene mukumasulira. Musalole kumasulira m'zinenero zina kukukhudzani.

en: One thing I don't like about the iPad is that you can't easily install apps that aren't available through Apple's App Store.
ny: Chinthu chimodzi chomwe sindimakonda pa iPad ndikuti simungathe kukhazikitsa mapulogalamu omwe sapezeka kudzera pa Apple's App Store.

en: Jingle Bells, a popular song around Christmas time, is not really a Christmas song. The lyrics say nothing about Christmas.
ny: Jingle Bells, nyimbo yotchuka pa nthawi ya Khrisimasi, si nyimbo ya Khrisimasi. Mawu ake sanena chilichonse chokhudza Khirisimasi.

en: I used to watch this anime a lot when I was a kid, but I can't quite remember what happened to the hero in the final episode.
ny: Ndinkakonda kuwonera anime iyi kwambiri ndili mwana, koma sindikukumbukira zomwe zidachitikira ngwazi mu gawo lomaliza.

en: If your company primarily does business with America, then you should be studying English with a native speaker from America.
ny: Ngati kampani yanu imachita bizinesi ndi America, ndiye kuti mukuyenera kuphunzira Chingerezi ndi wolankhula wochokera ku America.

en: The English language is undoubtedly the easiest and at the same time the most efficient means of international communication.
ny: Chilankhulo cha Chingerezi mosakayikira ndichosavuta komanso nthawi yomweyo njira yabwino kwambiri yolumikizirana padziko lonse lapansi.

en: Instead of giving each other Christmas presents this year, we donated the amount we would have spent on presents to a charity.
ny: M’malo mopatsana mphatso za Khrisimasi chaka chino, tinapereka ndalama zimene tikanapereka ku bungwe lachifundo.

en: Singer and actress Selena Gomez started her career at age seven on the children's public television show "Barney and Friends."
ny: Woyimba komanso wochita masewero a Selena Gomez adayamba ntchito yake ali ndi zaka zisanu ndi ziwiri pa TV ya ana "Barney and Friends".

en: A good newspaper reporter takes advantage of what he learns from any source, even the "little bird told him so" type of source.
ny: Mtolankhani wabwino wa nyuzipepala amapezerapo mwayi pa zomwe amaphunzira kuchokera kulikonse, ngakhale "mbalame yaying'ono idamuuza choncho" mtundu wa gwero.

en: Food prices are at their highest level since the United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization began keeping records in 1990.
ny: Mitengo yazakudya ndiyokwera kwambiri kuyambira pomwe bungwe la United Nations Food and Agriculture Organisation lidayamba kusunga mbiri mu 1990.

en: I've heard that it's impossible to sound like a native speaker unless one starts speaking the language before the age of twelve.
ny: Ndamva kuti n’zosatheka kumveka ngati munthu wolankhula chinenerocho pokhapokha munthu atayamba kulankhula chinenerocho asanakwanitse zaka khumi ndi ziwiri.

en: No matter what your profession, or how happy you may be in it, there are moments when you wish you had chosen some other career.
ny: Ziribe kanthu kuti ntchito yanu ndi yotani, kapena mungakhale osangalala bwanji, pali nthawi yomwe mumalakalaka mutasankha ntchito ina.

en: When Tom was a kid, he used to collect his father's cigarette butts until he had enough tobacco to roll a cigarette for himself.
ny: Tom ali wamng’ono, ankatolera ndudu za bambo ake mpaka atapeza fodya wokwanira kuti azidzigudubuza ndudu.

en: Satellite imagery is being used in an effort to narrow down the area in the Indian Ocean where floating debris has been observed.
ny: Zithunzi za satellite zikugwiritsidwa ntchito pofuna kuchepetsa dera la ku Indian Ocean pomwe zinyalala zoyandama zawonedwa.

en: Honey, I know the budget is tight, but do you think we could splurge a bit and have a night out at a fancy restaurant this weekend?
ny: Wokondedwa, ndikudziwa kuti bajeti ndi yocheperako, koma mukuganiza kuti titha kutaya pang'ono ndikupita kumalo odyera apamwamba kumapeto kwa sabata ino?

en: Tom went to a fortune teller at the town fair and was told that someone would come into his life whose first name started with "M".
ny: Tom anapita kwa wobwebweta pachiwonetsero cha tawuni ndipo adauzidwa kuti pabwera munthu wina yemwe dzina lake loyamba lidayamba ndi "M".

en: A committee is a group of people who individually can do nothing, but who, as a group, can meet and decide that nothing can be done.
ny: Komiti ndi gulu la anthu omwe aliyense payekha sangachite kalikonse, koma omwe, monga gulu, akhoza kukumana ndikusankha kuti palibe chomwe chingachitike.

en: Oh, sure, I studied English in my school days. But it wasn't until two or three years ago that I really started taking it seriously.
ny: O, zedi, ndinaphunzira Chingerezi m'masiku anga akusukulu. Koma sizinali mpaka zaka ziŵiri kapena zitatu zapitazo pamene ndinayamba kuzilingalira mozama.

en: In 1964, Roger Miller agreed to record sixteen songs. One of those songs was "Dang Me." It became his first number one selling record.
ny: Mu 1964, Roger Miller adavomera kujambula nyimbo khumi ndi zisanu ndi chimodzi. Imodzi mwa nyimbozo inali "Dang Me." Inakhala mbiri yake yoyamba kugulitsa.

en: Tom hadn't washed clothes in a long time, so he searched through his dirty clothes to see if there was something clean enough to wear.
ny: Tom anali asanachapa zovala kwa nthawi yaitali, choncho anafufuza m’zovala zake zauve kuti aone ngati panali zinthu zoyera zokwanira.

en: One way to lower the number of errors in the Tatoeba Corpus would be to encourage people to only translate into their native languages.
ny: Njira imodzi yochepetsera zolakwika mu Tatoeba Corpus ingakhale kulimbikitsa anthu kumasulira m’zinenero zawo zokha.

en: I want a religion that respects the differences that exist between people and that states that each individual has their own personality.
ny: Ndikufuna chipembedzo chomwe chimalemekeza kusiyana komwe kulipo pakati pa anthu ndipo chimanena kuti munthu aliyense ali ndi umunthu wake.

en: She has a boyfriend she's been going out with since high school, but she feels their relationship is in a rut, so she's become discontented.
ny: Ali ndi chibwenzi chomwe wakhala akuyenda naye kuyambira kusekondale, koma akuwona kuti ubale wawo uli pachiwopsezo, ndiye wayamba kusakhutira.

en: Always use distilled water in steam irons because using ordinary water will cause a mineral build-up over time that will clog the steam holes.
ny: Nthawi zonse gwiritsani ntchito madzi osungunuka muzitsulo za nthunzi chifukwa kugwiritsa ntchito madzi wamba kumapangitsa kuti mchere ukhale wochuluka pakapita nthawi womwe udzatseke mabowo a nthunzi.

en: I think it's a shame that some foreign language teachers were able to graduate from college without ever having studied with a native speaker.
ny: Ine ndikuganiza ndi manyazi kuti ena chinenero aphunzitsi anatha maphunziro ku koleji popanda kuphunzira ndi mbadwa wolankhula.

en: You can fool some of the people all of the time, and all of the people some of the time, but you can't fool all of the people all of the time.
ny: Mukhoza kupusitsa anthu ena nthawi zonse, ndi anthu onse nthawi zina, koma simungapusitse anthu onse nthawi zonse.

en: If you translate from your second language into your own native language, rather than the other way around, you're less likely to make mistakes.
ny: Ngati mutamasulira kuchokera kuchilankhulo chanu chachiwiri kupita m'chinenero chanu, osati njira ina, simungalakwitse.

en: People speak so much about the need for leaving a better planet for our children, and forget the urgency of leaving better children for our planet.
ny: Anthu amalankhula kwambiri za kufunika kosiyira ana athu dziko lapansi labwino, ndikuiwala kufunika kosiya ana abwinoko ku pulaneti lathu.

en: The Australian Prime Minister has said that he does not intend to engage in megaphone diplomacy with Egypt over the jailing of an Australian journalist.
ny: Prime Minister waku Australia wati sakufuna kuchita nawo zokambirana za megaphone ndi Egypt pa kumangidwa kwa mtolankhani waku Australia.

en: You may not learn to speak as well as a native speaker, but you should be able to speak well enough that native speakers will understand what you have to say.
ny: Mwina simungaphunzire kulankhula bwino ngati mbadwa, koma muyenera kulankhula bwino kuti olankhula mbadwa amvetse zomwe mukunena.

en: If a person has not had a chance to acquire his target language by the time he's an adult, he's unlikely to be able to reach native speaker level in that language.
ny: Ngati munthu alibe mwayi kupeza chandamale chinenero ndi nthawi iye wamkulu, iye n'zokayikitsa kuti athe kufika mbadwa wokamba mlingo m'chinenero chimenecho.

en: It's still too hard to find a job. And even if you have a job, chances are you're having a tougher time paying the rising costs of everything from groceries to gas.
ny: Cakali cintu ciyandika kapati kucinca mulimo. Ndipo ngakhale mutakhala ndi ntchito, mwayi ndiwe kuti mukukhala ndi nthawi yovuta kwambiri yolipira kukwera mtengo kwa chilichonse kuyambira pazakudya mpaka mafuta.

en: You can't easily put photos on an iPad from more than one computer. However, you can email photos to yourself from various computers and download these photos to your iPad.
ny: Inu simungakhoze kuika zithunzi pa iPad kuchokera oposa kompyuta. Komabe, mukhoza imelo zithunzi nokha zosiyanasiyana makompyuta ndi kukopera zithunzi izi anu iPad.

en: You can't view Flash content on an iPad. However, you can easily email yourself the URLs of these web pages and view that content on your regular computer when you get home.
ny: Simungathe kuwona zomwe zili pa Flash pa iPad. Komabe, mutha kudzitumizira imelo mosavuta ma URL a masamba awa ndikuwona zomwe zili pakompyuta yanu yokhazikika mukafika kunyumba.

en: A mistake young people often make is to start learning too many languages at the same time, as they underestimate the difficulties and overestimate their own ability to learn them.
ny: Cholakwa chimene achichepere amachita kaŵirikaŵiri ndicho kuyamba kuphunzira zinenero zambiri panthaŵi imodzi, popeza amapeputsa zovutazo ndi kudzilingalira mopambanitsa luso lawo la kuziphunzira.

en: No matter how much you try to convince people that chocolate is vanilla, it'll still be chocolate, even though you may manage to convince yourself and a few others that it's vanilla.
ny: Ziribe kanthu momwe mungayesere kutsimikizira anthu kuti chokoleti ndi vanila, idzakhalabe chokoleti, ngakhale mutha kudzitsimikizira nokha ndi ena ochepa kuti ndi vanila.

en: In 1969, Roger Miller recorded a song called "You Don't Want My Love." Today, this song is better known as "In the Summer Time." It's the first song he wrote and sang that became popular.
ny: Mu 1969, Roger Miller adalemba nyimbo yotchedwa "Sukufuna Chikondi Changa." Masiku ano, nyimboyi imadziwika bwino kuti "Munthawi ya Chilimwe." Ndi nyimbo yoyamba yomwe adalemba ndikuyimba yomwe idatchuka.
